channel.title: dynamodb on Anakin- 奔向NB的生活
channel.description: Recent content in dynamodb on Anakin- 奔向NB的生活

item.title: How to Develop DynamoDB Locally
item.description: Download DynamoDB wget https://s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/dynamodb-local-singapore/dynamodb_local_latest.tar.gz Extract file tar zxvf dynamodb_local_latest.tar.gz Start Dynamo DB locally java -Djava.library.path=./DynamoDBLocal_lib -jar DynamoDBLocal.jar -sharedDb Create fake aws credential edit .aws/config [profile default] output = text region = ap-southeast-1 edit .aws/credentials [default] aws_access_key_id = fakeMyKeyId aws_secret_access_key = fakeSecretAccessKey Create demo table create table json file, user_table.json { "TableName": "user-demo-table", "AttributeDefinitions": [ { "AttributeName": "user_name", "AttributeType": "S" }], "KeySchema": [{ "KeyType": "HASH", "AttributeName": "user_name" }], "ProvisionedThroughput": { "WriteCapacityUnits": 5, "ReadCapacityUnits": 5 } } create table aws dynamodb create-table --region ap-southeast-1 --cli-input-json file://user_table.
